sanskrit: धृष्टकेतुश्चेकितानः काशिराजश्च वीर्यवान्| पुरुजित्कुन्तिभोजश्च शैब्यश्च नरपुङ्गवः  || 1.5 ||
Translation: Dhrishtaketu, Chekitana, the valiant king of Kasi, Purujit, Kuntibhoja, and Saibya—the best of men.
answer: The name of the king from Kashi who is mentioned as a warrior in the armies of the Pandavas in the Bhagavad Gita is Chekitana, the valiant king of Kasi.
